description: From the Marquis de Sade  +â€Ž -ic, probably after French sadique.

adjectives.description: sadic (comparative more sadic, superlative most sadic)

examples: Nothing but the infernal cruelty of their interview of the morning could have forced him to make a proposal of illicit intercourse to a young lady to whom hitherto he had spoken not even one word of affection. It was an effect of a Sadic kind.
